component.text: Roll over each device to learn about the three VTP modes.

• Forwards VTP advertisements
  • Ignores information contained in the VTP message
  • Does not modify its database when receiving updates
  • Does not send out an update that indicates a change of its own VLAN database

• Creates, modifies, and deletes VLANs and VLAN configuration parameters for the entire domain
  • Saves VLAN configuration information in the switch NVRAM
  • Sends VTP messages out all trunk ports

• Does not create, modify, or delete VLAN information
  • Modifies its own database with any VLAN changes sent from the server
  • Sends VTP messages out all trunk ports
